com.mgseb.wordgame.domain

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mgseb.wordgame.domain.Question

  • public class Question
extends Object
    Manages question-answer pairs. Conceals partial answers to varying extent. Checks whether player's input matches answer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Question(String question, String answer)
      Sets up class variables.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Question

        public Question(String question,
        String answer)
        Sets up class variables. Partial answer is initially fully visible.
        Parameters:
        question - Question string read from file by QuestionReader
        answer - Answer string read from file by QuestionReader

    • Method Detail

      • getQuestion

        public String getQuestion()

      • getAnswer

        public String getAnswer()

      • getPartialAnswer

        public String getPartialAnswer(Difficulty difficulty)
        Returns partially conceals, then returns partial answer. Extent of concealment depends on chosen game difficulty.
        Parameters:
        difficulty - the difficulty setting chosen by the user
        Returns:
        partially concealed answer to serve as a hint to the user

      • isCorrect

        public boolean isCorrect(String guess)
        Checks whether user input matches answer. Case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        guess - user input
        Returns:
        the correctness of the user's guess

      • hideLetters

        public void hideLetters(Difficulty difficulty)
        Partially conceals partial answer. Number of hidden letters depends on chosen difficulty.
        Parameters:
        difficulty - the difficulty setting chosen by the user
